item.description:
Where has K gone?

J has to go into the past to work with K in the past to bring

him back into existence in the present!

A)

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1409024/

www.imdb.com/title/tt1409024/

 

B)

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Men_in_Black_3

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Men_in_Black_3

C)

http://www.fandango.com/meninblackiii_135737/movieoverview?date=

www.fandango.com/meninblackiii_135737/movieoverview?date=

 

Those of you who live North and West of New Haven do not

Have to RSVP No and say that it is too far for you to travel.

I will delete that post if I read it.

I went to a movie in North Haven recently and no one came.

So you had your chance to attend a Movie Meet Up

North of New Haven.  I will have another Meet Up North

of New Haven in a few weeks.

I will give more detailed information of where to meet only to those

Who RSVP Yes or who E-mail me directly, not to those

Who post on this link.  I am having more problems with

Pain in the Ass Members who are complaining about not having

better information on where to meet. They either were sent that

information and did not bother to read it or did not RSVP Yes.

This weekend starts the 3 strikes you are out rule.

RSVP Yes 3 times and not show up you are deleted.

More information in an upcoming Trip Report.
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes.
item.name: Coffee Talk@MIB 3 at Stratford Theater
